snippet.title: Sonic vs Darkness - Island Update [Update Log #9]
snippet.description:
Sorry for the super long wait! Life got super busy for me. Many thanks to those who've waited patiently for my return. I hope you enjoy!

Chao Resort Island is both a new fan game and extension to Sonic vs Darkness! You'll be able to raise Chao on an island at 3 different resorts. Most of the features included in the game will be from the Chao World in Sonic Adventure 2 Battle. The difference of features between the fan game and extension will be revealed in another video.

Special thanks to Goncas23 for helping me with some of the sprites for both fan games!

To receive updates on my progress with this fan game, feel free to follow me on twitter!

Link to the full chao theme: https://youtu.be/ITWra6fLQy4
------------------------------------------------------------------

Subscribe for more content! ► http://bit.ly/1ywTmV9
Facebook ► http://on.fb.me/12JPx0O
Twitter ► http://bit.ly/2hblIxx
Soundcloud ► http://bit.ly/1wXwiyn

Download the latest version of this fan game:
https://nefault1st.wordpress.com/downloads/sonic-vs-darkness-true-nightmare-revived/
(Note: New content shown in the update logs will not be immediately added to the game unless stated otherwise.)

------------------------------------------------------------------

DISCLAIMER: This is a non-profit fan-made project titled "Sonic vs Darkness - True Nightmare Revived". This project and it's developers are in no way affiliated with SEGA® or Sonic Team™. All registered trademarks and copyrights of "Sonic the Hedgehog" belong to SEGA®. All other trademarks belong to their respective owners.
